      • mouseHit

        boolean mouseHit(int mouseX,
               int mouseY)
        Returns whether the mouse is positioned over the element.
        Parameters:
        mouseX - the x coordinate of the mouse cursor
        mouseY - the y coordinate of the mouse cursor.
        Returns:
        true if the mouse is over the Drawable
